overview: Lisa, a 21 year old student from South Africa, is sent to Mrs. Gill to be trained in the art of underwear fitting. Little does she realize that she is in the hands of a female predator. Mrs. Gill feels and fondles, barely able to speak with excitement, under the guise of normality. No sexy talk here... just action. This is erotica at its finest. The shy, young African girl and the mature, nervous matron. Nothing is left to the imagination.
title: Adventures of an Underwear Fitter 10
